original_text: But Oholibah did even worse things, as a prostitute does. She saw pictures of men on the walls. They were bright red pictures that people had made of Babylonian men.
korean_text: 그가 음행을 더하였음은 붉은 색으로 벽에 그린 사람의 형상 곧 갈대아 사람의 형상을 보았음이니

sentences.original_text: But Oholibah did even worse things
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 오홀리바는 더 나쁜 일들을 했습니다

sentences.original_text: She saw pictures of men on the walls
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 벽에 있는 남자들의 그림들을 보았습니다

sentences.original_text: that people had made of Babylonian men
